The Emperor heard these words, tears streaming down his face. After a long while, he said, Venerable Monk
and said, Our small country has no offerings at all. For many years, you have been in our midst.
I have no intention of slighting you.
Although I am the ruler of men, I am unworthy to occupy the position of the Son of Heaven.
Every time I bid farewell to the Venerable Monk when he passes through our small country,
I humbly hope that the Venerable Monk will have compassion and stay on for three to five days. Is this possible? Venerable Yuan said,
As for the meaning of nirvana, it is originally free from clinging.
If there is clinging, it all belongs to delusion.
I humbly hope that Your Majesty will not harbor sorrow.
I have a wish to return to the mountains. The Emperor saw him,
and Venerable Yuan's words were so sincere that it was difficult to keep him.
There was an edict first reported to the Six Palaces, secretly lining up to see him off.
At that time, the Emperor yearned for him, and the entire country's ministers all saw him off together.
Venerable Yuan left the palace and parted from the dragon tower.
Looking at Mount Qixia, the road is far.
Gazing at the rivers and lakes, one roams freely.
On this day, Master Yuan was able to travel far and arrive promptly.
He then secretly manifested his spiritual powers.
As soon as Master Yuan left Chang'an, clouds arose under his feet.
Like a strong man stretching his arm, in an instant he arrived at Mount Qixia.
Master Yuan also did not return to his old temple.
Ten li away,
he came to a steep ridge and temporarily built a grass hut.
Sitting in meditation inside, he then began to reread the old scrolls.
As he raised his voice to chant the sutra,
after several months,
Master Yuan suddenly looked at the high plain.
He called out, This is it!
The surroundings were majestic peaks with cranes crying, and dragons roaring in the valley below.
All the hundred valleys and thousand peaks were in full bloom.
The flat ground had long flowing water,
and the garden bloomed imperishable flowers.
This was where the Tathagata practiced.
Thereupon, Master Yuan sat upright and entered samadhi.

However, with a pure mind and clear thoughts, contemplating the Buddha's path, thinking that human life is not long and the mundane world is unworthy, he then used his mind as the king to build a Dharma boat to take refuge in the upper realm.
Daren did not use the boat.
It is not made of ordinary materials.
